trans_title: 札哈哈蒂：伟大建筑的诞生
introduction: One of the world's greatest architects, Zaha Hadid, is featured in this documentary, chronicling one of her signature works - The Heyar Aliyey Center of Aku. An award-winning achievement, the Center shows the talents of one of the great artists of architecture. Here's the story of her masterpiece.
chinese_title: 札哈哈蒂：伟大建筑的诞生
